lead_paragraph: Cheats will not prosper was the message of International Cycling Union (UCI) president Brian Cookson on Tuesday as the governing body stepped up its fight against mechanical fraud by showcasing a new method to detect hidden motors in bikes.

headline.print_headline: Cookson Warns Cheats as UCI Showcases Motor Detection Method
headline.main: Cookson Warns Cheats as UCI Showcases Motor Detection Method

snippet: Cheats will not prosper was the message of International Cycling Union (UCI) president Brian Cookson on Tuesday as the governing body stepped up its fight against mechanical fraud by showcasing a new method to detect hidden motors in bikes....
